author: cutting
msg: AVRO-1623. Java: Fix GenericData#validate to correctly resolve unions.  Contributed by Jeffrey Mullins.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-1545. Python. Fix to retain schema properties on primitive types.  Contributed by Dustin Spicuzza.

author: mxmanghi
msg: * src/experimental/rivetCore.c: new 'headers sent' introspection command to
understand whether headers have been sent already
* rivet/rivet-tcl/redirect.tcl: command didn't fail with a meaningful message
if headers had been sent already because of ::rivet::no_body that blocks output
to the socket. The procedure now returns an error if ::rivet::headers sent

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-1614. Java: In generated builder classes, add accessors to field sub-builders, permitting easier creation of nested, optional structures.  Contributed by Niels Basjes.

author: markt
msg: Remove code highlighted as unused by UCDetector
